text: wmn ystjb lawamr allah taealaa whdy rasulih muhamad salaa allah ealayh wasalam fawlyk aladhin eazum shanihim wqdrhm, fakanuu fi shbt man 'aneam allah taealaa ealayhim bialjanat min al'anbia' walsidiyqin aladhin kmul tsdyqhm bima ja'at bih alrsl, aetqadana wqwla wemla walshuhada' fi sabil allah wasalih almwmnyn, whasun hwla' rfqa' fi aljnt
